data.description: Automated access to the E-Plus Website
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This Module will provide a smart interface to the customer care
    website of germany's mobile phone provider E-Plus. It will provide
    accessing and parsing routines to the online bill and account
    configuration options located at
    https://kundenbetreuung.eplus-online.de/.
